DEMO_602_MSG_010:
̂Good morning, Master ȁ. 
You sure are looking well today!
DEMO_602_MSG_020:
̂What's the matter? You seem so surprised!?
Really!? You can't remember a thing?
ā
DEMO_602_MSG_030:
̂This is Paradise, Master ȁ! You've lived
here for quite some time, with your brother Anses!
DEMO_602_MSG_040:
̂Master Anses has been living here with you ever since
he returned triumphant from that great battle.
ā
DEMO_602_MSG_050:
̂Master Anses just went venturing off into the western
woods, however...
DEMO_602_MSG_060:
̂If you wish to speak with him, why not go track 
him down, Master ȁ!?
